profile.profileDescription: This is a minimal profile adapted to the needs of foto-ch.ch

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative description. This is the primary text used to document the item.

label.name: Beschreibung
label.description: Erzählerische Beschreibung. Dies ist die Hauptbeschreibung des Objektes.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of item description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Working Description
label.description: Notes about the entities way of working.

role.name: Researcher - Photographers
role.description: Allows users to only search and view - but not edit - Photographers

role.name: Researcher - Organizations
role.description: Allows users to only search and view - but not edit - Photographers and Organizations

group.name: Cataloguers
group.description: Users who can add and edit catalogue entries
